longBusinessSummary: Oswal Agro Mills Limited engages in the trading of commodities in India. It operates through Trading, Real Estate, and Investment segments. The company is involved in the development and trading of real estate projects. In addition, it invests in equity instruments and other securities; and invests surplus funds in inter-corporate deposits, as well as trades in mutual funds and other miscellaneous incomes. Oswal Agro Mills Limited was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
